lyrics.text:
Ke tau fakafeta’i
Ki hotau ‘Otua,
‘I he loto lelei,
‘I he ‘ene ‘ofa,
He ‘oku tau kei mo’ui,
‘O hoko ki he ta’u fo’ou.

Ko e ‘akau kovi,
‘A kitautolu.
Pea fua kovi,
Ko e angahala;
Na’e tonu ke tau mate,
Pea laku ki he afi.

Sīsū fakafeta’i,
‘I ho hūfekina,
‘A e tu’utāmaki,
Ki homau ‘Otua,
Ko ia kuo mau lava,
‘O hoko ki he ta’u fo’ou.
